Coming out of the neighborhood magic shop, you look at the bottle you just bought. "Magic Growth Formula." The shopkeeper had said it can make anything grow. You decide to use it on your potted plants, since they weren't growing well. You walk down the street, but suddenly trip on a crack of the sidewalk. "Oh, no!" You cry as the bottle flies out of your hand and lands, breaking on top of a head of a passing boy wearing a bandana. The contents run down his face and clothes and he groans. He swears and starts to find something in his pocket to wipe off the formula, but then you see his body tremble and grow! At least 50 ft! You gape at his inhumanly size. Luckly, no one was outside, for it was too hot. The boy looks down at himself in shock, then sees you. He glares and raises his humongous sneaker, preparing to step on you. What do you do?

"Yes, sir. I tell you. We've never had visitors before. Guess it goes to show you that anything is possible. Well, better get the tools." He starts walking back to the city.


An hour and a half later...

The repairman comes back and gets right to work. He fixes the engine in practically no time. "Wow, thanks," Mr. Kanbara says, surprised. "You're welcome," the man says and puts away his tools. "How much do we owe you?" Mr. Minamoto asks, taking out his credit card. "Ah, think nothing of it," the repairman replies. "You're guests here, so it's free." Everyone cheers. Mr. Kanbara shakes the repairman's hand, joyfully. "Thank you!"


After everyone is seated...

Mr. Kanbara is seated at the driver's seat, while everyone sits behind him. "Fasten your seatbelts!" he announces and turns on the engine. Instantly, the engine roars, loudly. Mr. Kanbara presses a button that moves the ship forward and into the air. You all then start your journey back home.
11111111221111111121221111111.title: A day on Mars

choices: Go find someone who can
Give up and enjoy life on the new planet
111111112211111111212211112.content:
You and Kouji float around the ship, enjoying the view of space. "It's so pretty up here," you say, looking at all of the stars. "Yeah..." Kouji replies. After 5 hours, you both reach the asteroid belt. Kouji holds you in his hands as the ship is bombarded with asteroids. Unfortunately, the rocket ship had no seats or seatbelts(Dumb, isn't it?), so you both are tossed to and fro inside the rocket. One asteroid collides with the ship, knocking it off course. The ship turns around and upside down and ends up flying in a totally different direction.


When the tossing and turning stops, Kouji realizes that he and you are heading to another planet out of the solar system. He lets you go so you could see. "This can't be Mars," you say, looking at the bluish green planet. "It's not," Kouji replies. "So, we're out of the solar system?" you ask. "I guess so," Kouji answers. "I've never seen a planet like this before." Suddenly, the ship rumbles and Kouji grabs you and holds you in his hands again. The gravity of the planet is pulling the ship to it. Soon, the ship crashes onto the planet, throwing Kouji into a wall. He curses under his breath. He had hit his head when he banged into the wall. Kouji realizes that he's still holding you, so he puts you down, gently.


"Whoa..." you say in awe. From what you can see, the sky is green and the grass is blue. You both have landed in a field. You decide to get out and see if the planet had oxygen, so you press the button beside the door and the door opens. Kouji tries to stop you, for fear that the planet's atmosphere may not be breathable, but it's too late now. You're already walking down the steps of the ship. And you wish you hadn't because the air wasn't breathable. Gasping, you fall to the ground. Kouji could hear you gasping and comes outside to help, but starts gasping for air, too, and falls to the ground. 'Won't someone help me?!' you think, panicky. Suddenly, two figures come and put a helmet on your head. A helmet of oxygen. Relieved, you slowly take in the cool air. As for Kouji, he's still gasping for air and is nearly dead, but the two figures inject him with something to knock him out. You gasp from inside the helmet. 'It is all right,' a voice inside your mind tells you. 'We did that because we do not have a helmet large enough for him. Your friend is fine.' You look up and see one of the figures looking at you, realizing that he's the one that's talking to you, telepathically. The figure looks totally human, but had a strange mark on his forehead. The other figure is studying Kouji with some kind of gizmo. The first figure turns to you. 'We will take you back to our laboratory for testing. We want to know where you came from and do not worry. We will find a way to shrink Kouji back down.' You gasp again. How did he know Kouji wasn't really a giant?! And how did he know his name?! Before you could ask, the figure says, telepathically: 'I knew because I read your mind. Do not be afraid. We do not wish you any harm. Now, come with me.' He looks at his partner and nods to him. You stand up as the figure begins to walk away. You look at Kouji, fearfully. You didn't want to leave him alone with that guy. 'Do not worry,' he says to you. 'My partner will stay with him until help comes along. Since he is a giant, it will take a lot of people to lift him. We are taking him back to our laboratory.' 'Okay,' you think and start to follow him.


At the laboratory...

The alien tells you it's safe to take off your helmet. The laboratory is filled with oxygen. Sighing, you take off your helmet and see that he's right. You place the helmet on a desk and the human-like alien tells you to sit on one of those things you see in a doctor's office. Obeyingly, you do and the alien starts his testing.


The alien runs all sorts of tests on you. Some were scary, but he tells you not to be afraid and that it wouldn't hurt. Lastly, he injects you with some kind of chemical which would help you to breathe his kind of air. Later, Kouji is brought in by the alien's partner and others. Don't worry, though. He's large enough to fit inside the laboratory. The aliens run tests on Kouji and also inject him with the chemical that would let him breathe their kind of air. And soon, they mix some kind of chemical that returns Kouji to normal size. Happily, you hug him. Once he's awake, that is.


You and Kouji explore the planet. It's very weird, but very pretty. You run into all sorts of aliens. And all of them were really friendly. As they day goes by, though, you begin to miss Earth. And your mom and dad. "We can't go back there now," Kouji tells you. "The ship is trashed." You look down, sadly. Kouji tilts your head up, so that you're both looking eye-to-eye. "Don't worry, (your name). Everything will be okay." You sniff and hug him, crying into his shoulder. Kouji hugs you back, shushing you. After your cry, Kouji decides to find a place to stay for the night. The planet doesn't exactly have hotels...or cities, so you both have to camp out. The next day, you run into the two alien scientists and you tell them that you want to go home. The aliens look at the ship and, unfortunately, tell you that they can't fix it. Now what do you do?
111111112211111111212211112.title: Crash landing on a new planet

choices: Head back to Earth
1111111122111111112122111121.content:
You decide to find someone who can fix the rocket. You and Kouji look everywhere for someone...anyone, but with no luck. Just as you are about to give up, a guy walks up to you. "You're new here, aren't you?" he asks. "Yes," you say, suspiciously."Why do you ask?" Even though, the natives were friendly, you couldn't risk anything on this planet. Who knows what may happen? The guy sighs in relief and places a hand on your shoulder. "You don't know how lucky I am to see other humans! I've been trying to get off this planet for years!" "How long have you been here?" you ask. "About 10 years," the guy replies. "I'm an astronaut from Earth. I crash landed onto this planet on my way to Mars. I was to be the first astronaut ever to land on the planet, but the asteroid belt had other plans. So, where are you kids headed?" Kouji eyes the man suspiciously, as you give him your answer. "Unfortunately, the natives here don't know how to fix a rocket," the man tells you. "But I've been fixing up my ship, though, and it's almost finished. I'm good at fixin' stuff." You beam brightly. "Can you give us a lift back to Earth?" "Sure can," the guy replies, grinning. "Kouji, we're going to be going home soon!" you cry, happily. Kouji doesn't reply. He still doesn't trust the guy, but that's Kouji for you.

Later...

The man, whose name is Michael, takes you and Kouji back to his ship. It's a large rocket, but not as big as the rocket you and Kouji were in. "Yep," Michael says, proudly. "I've been working on this baby for a long time and believe me, it wasn't easy. This planet hardly has the necessary materials to fix anything, but I found them." "Is there anything I can do to help?" you ask, trying to be helpful. Truthfully, the faster Michael is, the faster you could get off the planet. "Nah," Michael replies. "I can do it. Besides, I don't think you know anything about fixing rocket engines." "Okay," you say and sit down on the ground to wait. Kouji leans up against the rocket and crosses his arms as the man prepares to continue working on his ship.

After 4 hours...

"Well, I think it's just about ready," Michael announces. "Just have to tighten this screw here..." Using a wrench he found in the rocket, he tightens up the screw. "There. I'm finished." You are nearly asleep when he says the words. "Huh? You're done?" "Yep," Michael replies, smiling. "Finally." You cheer. Michael grins and goes into the rocket to put away the tools. You stand up as he pokes his head out, telling you and Kouji to come inside. You climb aboard, grateful, and Kouji follows, reluctantly.

Inside the ship, you see a few seats and the control board(You know. That thing with all of the buttons.). Michael sits up front with the control board and you and Kouji sit in the back.(I'm making this up as I go along. Bear with me.). "Now, to test this baby," Michael says, pressing a button. Instantly, the engine starts up. "Success!" he exclaims, happily. You cheer again and Kouji, for the first time, smiles. "Next stop: Earth!" Michael exclaims, as the rocket starts to take off. Thus, you start your journey back to Earth.
1111111122111111112122111121.title: You meet a new friend and he helps you to get home

choices: Head back to Japan
11111111221111111121221111211.content:
You all have to go through the asteroid belt again to get to Earth, but that's okay. At least you're going home. "Hang on!" Michael exclaims. "I'm gonna see if I can dodge these asteroids!" You grip the seat, tightly, as he turns the rocket full force around a huge asteroid. "Whoa!" "Sorry," Michael says, as he dodges another asteroid. "But these things are huge!" He turns the rocket around another big asteroid. After nearly 20 minutes, you all pass the asteroid belt. You sigh in relief and sink in your seat.


Later, you all finally reach Earth. Michael's rocket ship is fast. Really fast. "Boy, I'd never thought I'd be so happy to see this planet again!" Michael cries, happily. "Me, neither," you reply, agreeingly. Michael presses a button and unbuckles his seatbelt. Instantly, he starts to float. Your stomach growls. "I'm hungry." "I think I ate all of the food I had, but let me see," Michael says. He presses a button and, immediately, the food he has left, comes out. You unbuckle your seatbelt and float over towards the food and look at it. He has all sorts of goodies that make your mouth water. "Take your pick," he says, grinning. You reach out and grab(your favorite candy) and open the package. Instantly, the candy starts to float out of the package. You grab it and take a bite out of it before it got away. Michael opens a bag of licorice and starts eating, also. You turn and float over to Kouji. "Aren't you gonna eat something?" "I'm not hungry," he says. "Are you sure?" Michael asks, between bites. "There's plenty of stuff here." "I'm sure," Kouji replies. "Okay, Kouji," you say and start floating around.


After you've eaten all you can...

Michael puts away the rest of the food and floats over to his seat. He fastens his seatbelt and instructs you to do the same. Obeyingly, you do, content. Soon, Earth's gravity starts pulling the ship to it. "Hold on!" Michael exclaims, gripping the steering wheel(you know.), tightly. Faster and faster you're all pulled towards the Earth and soon, you land in the middle of an ocean. You look around and see nothing but water. "Where are we?" "I think the 'Pacific Ocean'," Michael answers. Suddenly, a boat appears. It's the Coast Guards and they pick you all up after seeing the rocket crash into the ocean.


At NASA, U.S.A....

NASA's scientists were wondering where Michael was and were glad that he turned home safely after nearly 10 years. Michael explains the situation to them and the scientists were amazed by it, but wondered where he had found you and Kouji. You explain the entire situation to the scientists and Michael. The scientists were amazed and heard of the giant, who isn't a giant anymore.

Michael takes you to his house, so that you could call your parents. He lives with his wife. Once he arrives home, his wife, immediately, hugs him, wondering where he had been for nearly 10 years. Michael explains the entire situation to her, then introduces you and Kouji. You and Kouji bow, politely. The woman laughs. She's not accustomed to Japanese trends. "Sorry," you say. "We're from Japan." "Japan?" the woman asks. "Oh, my. Then you two are so far away from home." "Yes," you say. "May we use your phone?" "Of course, dear," the woman replies. "The phone's over there, next to the kitchen door." She points to it. You thank her and walk over to it. Kouji follows. Picking up the reciever, you dial the international number, then your area code and number. After the first few rings, it's answered.

"Hello?"

"Mom?"

"(your name)! Oh, my goodness! Where are you?! I thought you and Kouji had died on Mars!"

"It's okay, Mom. I'm back on Earth in America. And me and Kouji didn't make it to Mars."

"What? What do you mean 'didn't make it'?! Where did you two end up?!"

"On another planet, but I'll explain later. Listen, I've gotta go. Kouji wants to call his parents. And don't worry. He's not gigantic anymore."

"All right, but I want you to call me later and explain where you've been. I've been worried sick about you! Your friend, Takuya, kept calling to see if you were back home. He's the only one that believed you didn't die."

You laugh. "Okay. Bye, Mom." You hang up and let Kouji use the phone.

"Would you like something to drink?" the woman asks you. "Sure, thanks," you reply. The woman goes into the kitchen and pours you a glass of lemonade, then, taking your glass, you sit down on the couch. Slowly, you take a sip and overhear Kouji explaining to his parents what had happened. Michael comes back, dressed in some ordinary clothes, and sits down next to his wife on the couch. You all talk and she asks you what it's like in Japan. You tell her all about the traditions of Japan. You even teach her a few Japanese phrases. She laughs and tries them, but she can't pronounce them well. Michael tries them, and, surprisingly, says them almost like a native Japanese speaker. You laugh and tell him that that was really good. Kouji soon joins you on the couch and you all have a good time, chatting together.
11111111221111111121221111211.title: Back on Earth once more

Zin sees Takuya as a giant.

A few days later, you and Kouji fly home to Japan on an airplane. Michael had booked two tickets to Japan using "Expedia.com"(Hey, he's an astronaut. I imagine he makes a lot of money.) and had let you both stay with him for awhile. Once you get home, your mom and dad hugs you tightly, refusing to let go. You explain the whole story to them and they were just grateful that you are okay. They didn't care that you didn't make it to Mars, but were really glad Michael was there to take you home. As for Kouji, his parents were really happy that he's alive and not a giant anymore. So is Takuya and his friends. Zin, though, won't be too happy. And what makes him really mad is the fact that Kouji's back on Earth and not dead on Mars. Yeah, he overheard from a kid that he was back. Zin decides to whip up his most strongest potion and use it on Kouji. The potion would make Kouji grow 10 times the size he was and stay that way, permanently. After the potion is made, he drops by Kouji's house to give it to him(He knows where he lives.), but he isn't there and Zin gives it to Kouji's father, stating that it's a gift to his son for returning back home, safely.


Later...

Kouji returns home and his father gives him the potion. Kouji thanks his father and goes upstairs to his room. Once upstairs, he throws away the potion, knowing it came from Zin. He'd had enough of being "Kouji the Giant" and didn't want to go through it again.

The next day...

Takuya, along with Izumi, Junpei, and Tomoki, come over to see how Kouji's doing. They're reall glad Kouji's not dead and back to his normal size. Suddenly, Tomoki notices the potion in the garbage can and picks it up. "What's this, Kouji?" "Tomoki, NO!" Kouji says and tries to grab it away from him, but Takuya gets to it first. "Man, am I thirsty!" Takuya says and opens the bottle to drink. Instantly, his body trembles and grows taller than the house(and breaking the roof.)! "Uh...guys?" Takuya asks, grinning sheepishly. "Was this supposed to happen?" Uh-oh. Looks like there's another giant in the city. What do you do?

He puts you in your room.

And without a warning you let out a big yawn. "I think it will be best if we start fresh in the morning." Kouji said. But you insisted you were fine. Kouji nodded to your decesion but still felt unsure about you. " Maybe we should sneak in the factory and snoop around." you suggested. "No way, 'cause One: I'm way too big to even fit in the front door." he said but the real reason was he didn't want to risk losing you again." Then why don't we--" you said up till you passed out and started head first towards the ground but luckily Kouji saw you and caught you in the palm of his hand. He immediately checked to see if you were alright. And don't worry you are. Kouji decided it was best to take you home after all the excitement you went through that day. After all, his company does sell magic potions to all kinds of magic shops, including this one. After a long minute, you shake your head. "No, I don't want it. Thanks, though." "Okay," the woman replies and puts away the bottle. You leave the store and rejoin Kouji again. He looks down at you, expectantly. "Well?" "She offered me the potion, but I refused," you tell him. "Why?" Kouji demands. "I just can't trust her," you reply. "She probably knows Zin and if she does, then she's working for him." Kouji sighs. "Kouji, I'm the one that made you this size, so I'm responsible for helping you and responsible for your safety," you say. "I wouldn't be able to live with myself, if something were to happen to you. I care about you..." Kouji looks at you, surprised, then smiles. "I care about you, too..." "Really?" you ask. "Yes," Kouji replies. Smiling, you sigh. "So, you're not mad?" "No," Kouji replies. "But I do want to know what the lady said to you in the shop." "Well..." you begin.


You and Kouji walk and end up at the park, unexpectantly. There, you decide to just chill there and revise your plan. While you both think of what to do, some kids run by, but happen to see Kouji's large figure and stop to gawk at him. You notice this and look up at Kouji, who is in deep thought. "COOL!" one kid's voice exclaims, startling Kouji. He looks down and sees the kids looking up at him. "How did you get so big?" another kid asks Kouji. "I ate all of my vegetables like a good boy," Kouji replies and rolls his eyes at the lame lie. You snicker. One boy walks, slowly, and, curiously, up to Kouji. "You're not gonna eat me, are you?" he asks, shyly. "No," Kouji replies. Then the kids start asking Kouji thousands of questions like: "Can you beat up this bully that keeps picking on me?" You then tell the kids not to tell others(especially their parents) about Kouji being gigantic and the kids nod. Then they run off again. All, but a boy your age. He's curious and wants to know more about you and Kouji's situation. Kouji starts to say no, but you tell him that you need all the help you can get and decide to trust the boy. Kouji sighs, as the boy grins. "My name's Danny," the boy replies. "I'm (your name) and that's Kouji," you say, extending a hand to shake. "Nice to meet you." "Likewise," Danny replies, shaking your hand.


You and Danny talk, getting to know each other and try to make up a new plan to shrink Kouji back down. Only Kouji remains silent. He doesn't trust the boy, but hey, that's Kouji for you. "We've been to the magic shop, but I don't trust the lady there," you tell Danny. "Hmm..." Danny says, thinking. "Come with me. I think I can shrink him back down." He gets up and motions you and Kouji to follow him. You follow him to...

Backfires and starts to make him grow larger

You and Kouji follow Danny to a large building you've never seen before. "Whoa," you say, in awe. "I've never seen this building before." "It was built a month ago," Danny tells you. "Oh," you say and turn to Kouji. "I'll stay out here," Kouji says before you could tell him to stay outside. "Okay," you reply. "Just make sure no one sees you." Kouji nods. With that, you and Danny enter the building.


Inside the building...

You look around the building. A waiting room is to your left and a secretary(sp?)'s desk is to the right of you. You could also see elevators down a hall. Danny walks up to the secretary's desk. "Excuse me, but is my father here? His name is Mr. Kino." "Yes," the worker replies. "He's in his office." "Thanks," Danny says and motions you to follow. You and Danny walk to one of the elevators. Danny presses a button and waits for the elevator to come down. After 3 minutes, the elevator comes down and you both get on it.


Upstairs on the 5th floor...

"Danny, what are you doing here?" the man, who happens to be Mr. Kino, asks. "Dad, I'd like you to meet (your name)," Danny says. "I met her in the park along with another person, but he's outside." "Can you help him?" Danny asks. "He's outside right now." "Of course I can help him," Danny's father replies, standing up. "Thanks, Dad," Danny says, grinning. Mr. Kino walks over to his son and rubs his head, affectionately. "No problem."


Back outside...

Kouji is sitting behind the building, waiting. Soon, you, Danny, and Mr. Kino find him. "Kouji, this is my Dad, Mr. Kevin Kino," Danny says to him. 10 minutes later...

"We've been working on a new chemical that can shrink people down in an instant, but it's still in its testing stage," one scientist says. "Please," you beg him. "Can we use it on Kouji? He really needs to get back to his normal size before the whole city sees him." "You're right," the scientist agrees. "All right. We'll use it on your friend, but I can't guarentee that it'll work." "Thanks," you say and the scientists head back around into the building.


20 minutes later, the scientists come back with the chemical in a bottle. A bottle that looks almost like the bottles the magic growth forumula comes in. You take the bottle from them and walk up to Kouji. "Here, Kouji. Drink this and let's hope it works." Kouji takes the bottle from you and starts to drink. You hold your breath and pray that Kouji returns to his normal size. Seconds later, his body starts to tremble and...

"Where have you been, young lady?!" your dad scolds. "You know you have chores to do!" " I forgot. I'm sorry, Dad," you say, trying to apologize. "But..." "But nothing!" your dad interrrupts. You open the door, but you don't see him anywhere. "Looking for me?" a voice says behind you. Turning around, you see Kouji looking down at you. "Kouji," you say. "Yeah?" he asks. "Thanks for taking me on a stroll last night," you say. "It made me feel better." Kouji nods. For the rest of the day, you and Kouji play together. At the end of the day, though, Kouji shrinks back to his normal size and you're both happy. Later, Kouji goes back home. His parents had been worried sick about him and didn't put up a fuss when he finally came home. They had called the police, but for some weird reason, they couldn't find him because whenever they'd get to a place where Kouji had been, they'd get there too late, but found giant footprints on the ground. The rumor and tale that a giant had been in the city spreads across the city like a wildfire, but only you and Kouji know the truth and you both aren't saying anything.
111121.title: Back to Normal

1111211.content:
You're sitting at home reading (your favorite book) when your phone rings. You put down the book, pick up the reciever, and place it to your ear.

"Hello?"

"Hey."

"Hi, Kouji. What's up?"

"Well, I'm calling to see if I can come over to watch movies with you since we can't see one together."

"I don't know...I have to ask my parents first."

"I'm sure they'll let me."

"Well, O.K. What time are you coming over?"

"7:00 P.M. That O.K.?"

"Yeah, I guess so. See you then."

"Yeah."

"Bye."

"Later."

You hang up the phone. Sighing, you exit your room and head downstairs. Your mom is in the kitchen, cooking dinner. "I though I heard your phone ringing," she says. "Who was it?" "It was Kouji," you reply."He called to see if he could come over to watch movies tomorrow. Can he?"
"I don't see why not," she replies. "What time is he coming?" "7:00, tomorrow night," you reply. "Is that too late?" "No," your mom replies. "In fact, you'll need somebody to keep you company tomorrow." "Why?" you ask. "Your father is taking me out to dinner," your mom replies. "You're not gonna call a babysitter to watch me, are you?" you ask. "No," she replies. "I trust you. Besides, Kouji seems like a nice boy. Now help me set the table. Your father will be home soon." You nod. "O.K." You head over to the cubbard and take out a few plates and glasses and set them neatly on the table.



The next day, you help your mom with some housework. You hate doing chores, but it beats being bored out your mind. Then you surf the Web and finish reading your favorite book. At 7:00, the doorbell rings and you go to the door and open it. Kouji stands on the other side, holding a bag and a bouquet of flowers. "Hi. You're right on time," you say. "Who are the flowers for?" Kouji hands you the flowers in reply. "Thanks," you say, smiling. "But you didn't have to buy these." Kouji walks up to you. "I wanted to," he whispers in your ear. You blush. "Aren't you going to let me come in?" Kouji asks, arching an eyebrow. "Uh...yeah," you reply and step back so he could come in. Kouji smirks. Your mom comes to the door wearing a red dress, jewelry, and red high heel shoes. "Hello, Kouji," she says. "How are you?" "I'm fine, Mrs. (last name)," he replies. "You look beautiful." "Why, thank you, Kouji," your mom replies. "I agree," a voice says behind your mom. It's your dad. He kisses her on the cheek. Your mom smiles. "Hello, Kouji," your dad greets. "Hello, Mr.(last name)," Kouji replies. "We'd better get going," your mom says. "Have fun, you two." She kisses you on the cheek and walks out the door, followed by your dad. You watch as your dad opens the car door for you mom. Then after she gets in, he shuts it and goes around to his side and gets in. He then starts the car and they drive off.



You shut the door and turn to Kouji. "What's in the bag?" you ask. "DVDs," Kouji simply states. "But I thought we were watching movies on TV," you say. "These movies are better," Kouji replies. "O.K.," you say and lead Kouji to the living room. Kouji takes off his sneakers and places them on the rug by the door, follows you into the living room, and takes a seat on the couch.You place the flowers in a vase and sit next to Kouji.You look into the bag and pull out a DVD. "Let's watch( the name of favorite movie) first," you say. "Whatever," Kouji replies. You get up, walk over to your DVD player, and press a button.(I don't own a DVD player, so bear with me.) The compartment slides out and you put the DVD in and press "PLAY", then you take your place back at the couch. You get comfortable as the movie begins. During the movie, you start to get sleepy and your head leans against Kouji's shoulder. Kouji notices this and wraps an arm around your shoulder. You yawn and snuggle deeper into him. Kouji blushes madly. By the end of the movie, you are asleep. Kouji takes the remote and turns off the TV. He lays you down on the couch, takes off his windbreaker, and lays down beside you, wraping an arm around your waist.



During the night, you wake up. Realizing how dark it is, you glance at the digital clock. Midnight. Suddenly, you feel arms dragging you back down to the couch and a blanket being pulled up to your shoulder. "Kouji?" you ask. "Hmm?" he replies. "Did my parents come back?" "I guess so, " Kouji replies, yawning. "This blanket was here when I woke up." You nod and follow his yawn with your own.


"Good night."

"G'night."


In the morning, you wake up, smelling breakfast. You notice that Kouji isn't beside you. Yawning, you pull back the blanket and get up. You shuffle to the kitchen see your mom cooking breakfast and Kouji eating breakfast. "Good morning, dear," your mom says, cheerily. "How'd you sleep?" "Very well," you reply, ploping into a chair across from Kouji. Your mom sits a glass of orange juice and a plate of scrambled eggs, bacon, and pancakes with butter and syrup in front of you. "Mom," you say, cutting your pancakes with your butterknife and fork. "Yes, dear?" your mom replies. "Did you or dad cover us up with the blanket last night when you came back?" "I covered you up with a blanket," your mom replies. "Why didn't you wake me up?" you ask. "Well, you both looked so peaceful, so I decided not to," your mom replies. "Oh," you reply. You start to eat. "I'm going shopping," your mom announces, picking up the car keys. "Do you want me to bring you something back?" "No," you reply, quickly swallowing a mouthfull of pancakes. Your mom nods and walks out the kitchen door. You hear a whinning sound in the basement as you continue eating. It's your dad working on the table in the basement. Soon, you and Kouji finish eating and place your dirty dishes in the sink. "I've gotta get cleaned up and dressed," you say. "Same here," Kouji replies. "But you didn't bring any extra clothes," you point out. "My dad came by this morning and brought some," Kouji tells you. "Oh," you reply and head up to your room. You take a shower, then head back to your room to get dressed. Kouji showers after you and gets dressed in the bathroom. For the rest of the day, you and Kouji talk, watch movies, and play outside. That night, Kouji gets ready to go home. You walk him to the door. "I had fun today," you say. "Yeah," Kouji replies. "Well, see ya," you say. Kouji nods, suddenly looking into your eyes. "What?" you ask. Kouji doesn't reply. He just walks up to you and slowly places his lips on yours. You jump, startled at first, but Kouji calmed you down by rubbing your back. Nearly melting at how soft and warm his lips are, you wrap your arm around his back as Kouji deepens the kiss. Soon, he pulls away and you look down, sadly. Kouji lifts your face up to his and smiles. "I'll see you later." "Promise?" you ask. "Promise," Kouji replies, kissing you lightly. "Aishiteru, (your name)." With that, Kouji heads to his dad's car. "Aishiteru, Kouji," you whisper.



Edit and note: For those of you that don't know, "aishiteru" means "I love you" in Japanese.

"PLEASE DON'T SQUISH ME!!!" You scream. "Why not?" he demands, loudly. "Because no one will be able to help you if you do," you reply. "You may stay this way forever!" "Yeah, right," he mutters. He lowers his foot. "Please!" you beg. "I made a mistake and I wanna help you. Please!" " You help me?" he scoffs. "You did this to me!" With that, he continues to lowers his foot onto you. "I'm sorry!" you cry. "I didn't mean to---" But he ignores you and stomps on you hard. You die, instantly.



That was so cruel. I suggest you go back and reread the story and this time, choose the first choice.
